text:
ฉันชอบเพลงนี้มากฉันฟังมัน ฉันรักความรักของโรซี่ทุกครั้งที่ฟัง น้ำตาของฉันจะไหลเมื่อเธอกล่อมเด็กเธอคิดถึงเวลาที่เธออยู่กับอเล็กซ์เพื่อนที่ดีที่สุดของเธอเธอรักอเล็กซ์
I like this song so much I listen to it. I miss Rosie's love every time I listen. My tears will flow when she lulls her child, thinking about the time she was with Alex, her best friend, she loves Alex.
나는이 노래를 아주 좋아한다. 내가들을 때마다 나는 로지의 사랑을 좋아한다. 그녀는 가장 친한 친구 알렉스와 시간을 놓치고 눈물이 흘러 나옵니다. 그녀는 알렉스를 좋아합니다.
我非常喜欢这首歌。 我每次听的时候都会想念罗西的爱。 当她想念她最好的朋友亚历克斯时，我的眼泪会流淌。 她喜欢亚历克斯 这是一个快乐的结局。﻿

author: Igor Vinícius

text:
"Littlest Things"

Sometimes I find myself sittin' back and reminiscing
Especially when I have to watch other people kissin'
And I remember when you started callin' me your missus
All the play fightin', all the flirtatious disses
I'd tell you sad stories about my childhood
I don't know why I trusted you but I knew that I could
We'd spend the whole weekend lying in our own dirt
I was just so happy in your boxers and your t-shirt

[Chorus]
Dreams, dreams
Of when we had just started things
Dreams of you and me
And it seems, it seems
That I can't shake those memories
I wonder if you have the same dreams too.

The littlest things that take me there
I know it sounds lame but it's so true
I know it's not right, but it seems unfair
The things are reminding me of you
Sometimes I wish we could just pretend
Even if only for one weekend
So come on, Tell me
Is this the end?

Drinkin' tea in bed
Watching DVD's
When I discovered all your dirty grotty magazines
You take me out shopping and all we'd buy is trainers
As if we ever needed anything to entertain us
The first time that you introduced me to your friends
And you could tell that I was nervous, so you held my hand
When I was feeling down, you made that face you do
There's no one in the world who could replace you

[Chorus]
Dreams, dreams
Of when we had just started things
Dreams of me and you
And it seems, it seems
That I can't shake those memories
I wonder if you feel the same way too

The littlest things that take me there
I know it sounds lame but it's so true
I know it's not right, but it seems unfair
The things are reminding me of you
Sometimes I wish we could just pretend
Even if only for one weekend
So come on, Tell me
Is this the end?﻿

author: Anasol Robles

text:
Às vezes me encontro voltando ao tempo e relembrando
Especialmente quando eu vejo outros se beijando
E me lembro de quando você começou a me chamar de sua moça
Todas briguinhas de mentira, todos os flertes
Eu te contei historias tristes da minha infância
Eu não sei porque confiei em você, mas eu sabia que podia
Passavamos o fim de semana em meio nossa própria bagunça
Eu era tão feliz nas suas cuecas e camisetas

Sonhos, sonhos
De quando só havíamos começado as coisas
Sonhos de você e eu
Me parece, me parece
Que não posso apagar essas memórias.
Me pergunto se você tem os mesmos sonhos que eu

As pequenas coisas que me levaram até lá
Eu sei parece besteira, mas é tão real
Sei que não é certo, mas parece injusto
Que as coisas me lembrem de você
Às vezes eu queria que pudessemos só fingir
Mesmo que só por um fim de semana
Então venha, me diga
Esse é o fim?

Bebendo chá na cama
Assistindo dvds
Quando descobri todas as suas grotescas revistas
Você me levou ao shopping e tudo que compramos foram tênis
Como se alguma vez precisássemos de algo mais para nos distrair
A primeira vez que você me apresentou à seus amigos
Você notou que eu estava nervosa, então segurou minha mão
E quando estou mal você faz "aquela cara"
Não há ninguém no mundo que possa te substituir

Sonhos, sonhos
De quando só havíamos começado as coisas
Sonhos de você e eu
Me parece, me parece
Que não posso apagar essas memórias.
Me pergunto se você se sente assim também

As pequenas coisas que me levaram até lá
Eu sei parece besteira, mas é tão real
Sei que não é certo, mas parece injusto
Que as coisas me lembrem de você
Às vezes eu queria que pudessemos só fingir
Mesmo que só por um fim de semana
Então venha, me diga
Esse é o fim?﻿

author: Tielle J

text:
"Littlest Things"

Sometimes I find myself sittin' back and reminiscing
Especially when I have to watch other people kissin'
And I remember when you started callin' me your miss's
All the play fightin', all the flirtatious disses
I'd tell you sad stories about my childhood
I don't why I trusted you but I knew that I could
We'd spend the whole weekend lying in our own dirt
I was just so happy in your boxers and your t-shirt

[Chorus]
Dreams, Dreams
Of when we had just started things
Dreams of you and me
It seems, It seems
That I can't shake those memories
I wonder if you have the same dreams too.

The littlest things that take me there
I know it sounds lame but its so true
I know its not right, but it seems unfair
That the things are reminding me of you
Sometimes I wish we could just pretend
Even if only for one weekend
So come on, Tell me
Is this the end?

Drinkin' tea in bed
Watching DVD's
When I discovered all your dirty grotty magazines
You take me out shopping and all we'd buy is trainers
As if we ever needed anything to entertain us
the first time that you introduced me to your friends
and you could tell I was nervous, so you held my hand
when I was feeling down, you made that face you do
There's no one in the world that could replace you

[Chorus]
Dreams, Dreams
Of when we had just started things
Dreams of me and you
It seems, It seems
That I can't shake those memories
I wonder if you feel the same way too

The littlest things that take me there
I know it sounds lame but its so true
I know its not right, but it seems unfair
That the things reminding me of you
Sometimes I wish we could just pretend
Even if only for one weekend
So come on, Tell me
Is this the end?﻿

author: Kristen Nguyen

text:
Sometimes I find myself sitting back and reminiscing
가끔 나는 가만히 앉아서 옛날 일을 떠올리곤해
 
Especially when I have to watch other people kissing
특히 다른 사람들이 키스하는 것을 보게 될 땐 더 그래

And I remember when you started calling me your miss's
네가 날 사귄게 실수였다고 말했을 때

All the play fighting, all the flirtatious disses
우리의 모든 장난스러운 애정표현들도 사라졌지

I'd tell you sad stories about my childhood
난 너한테 내 불행했던 어린 시절을 이야기 해줬어

I don't why I trusted you but I knew that I could
내가 왜 널 믿었는지는 모르겠지만 그땐 믿을 수 있을 줄 알았어
 
We'd spend the whole weekend lying in our own dirt
우린 주말내내 같이 땅에 누워서 시간을 보냈었지

I was just so happy in your boxers and your t-shirt
난 네 품속에서 정말 행복했었어
 
Dreams, Dreams of when we had just started things
우리가 사귀기 시작했을 때 가졌던 꿈들
 
Dreams of you and me
너와 나의 꿈

It seems, It seems that I can't shake those memories
나는 그 기억들을 감당할 수 없는것 같아
 
I wonder if you have the same dreams too
너도 같은 꿈을 가졌었는지가 궁금해

The littlest things that take me there
날 그 때로 데리고 가는 아주 작은 것들

I know it sounds lame but it's so true
진부하게 들리겠지만 사실이야

I know it's not right, but it seems unfair
옳지 않다는건 알지만 불공평한거 같아

that the things are reminding me of you
널 생각나게한단 말야

Sometimes I wish we could just pretend
가끔은 그냥 우리가 사귀는 척이라도 했으면 좋겠어

Even if only for one weekend
일주일만이라도 좋아
 
So come on, tell me, Is this the end?
어서 말해줘, 이제 끝인거니
 
 
Drinking tea in bed, watching DVDs
내가 너의 낡은 잡지들을 발견했을 때

When I discovered all your dirty grotty magazines
침대에서 차를 마시며 DVD를 보고 있었지 
﻿
 
You take me out shopping and all we'd buy is trainers
넌 날 데리고 쇼핑을 가서 우린 운동화를 샀지
 
as if we ever needed anything to entertain us
마치 아무것도 우리를 즐겁게 할 수 없다는 듯이

The first time that you introduced me to your friends
네가 처음으로 네 친구들을 소개시켜줬을 때

and you could tell that I was nervous so you held my hand
내가 긴장한 걸 알고 넌 내 손을 잡아줬었지

When I was feeling down you made that face you too
내가 기분이 안 좋을 땐 너도 함께 우울해 했어

There's no one in the world who could replace you
이 세상 그 누구도 널 대신할 수 없어
 
Dreams, Dreams of when we had just started things
우리가 사귀기 시작했을 때 가졌던 꿈들
 
Dreams of me and you
나와 너의 꿈
 
It seems, It seems that I can't shake those memories
나는 이 기억들을 감당할 수 없는것 같아
 
I wonder if you feel the same way too
너도 나와 같은 느낌이었는지가 궁금해

The littlest things that take me there
날 그 때로 데리고 가는 아주 작은 것들

I know it sounds lame but it's so true
진부하게 들리겠지만 사실이야

I know it's not right, but it seems unfair
옳지 않다는건 알지만 불공평한거 같아

that the things are reminding me of you
널 생각나게한단 말야

Sometimes I wish we could just pretend
가끔은 그냥 우리가 사귀는 척이라도 했으면 좋겠어

Even if only for one weekend
일주일만이라도 좋아
 
So come on, tell me, Is this the end?
어서 말해줘, 이제 끝인거니
﻿
